line_1: THOU, whom to counsel is to praise,
line_2: With candor view these friendly lays,

line_1: With candor view these friendly lays,
line_2: THOU, whom to counsel is to praise,

line_1: Nor from the vice of gaming free,
line_2: Believe the satire points at thee;

line_1: Believe the satire points at thee;
line_2: Nor from the vice of gaming free,

line_1: Who truth and worth betimes can'st prize,
line_2: Nor yet too sprightly to be wise,

line_1: Nor yet too sprightly to be wise,
line_2: Who truth and worth betimes can'st prize,

line_1: But hear this tale of ancient time,
line_2: Nor think it vain, tho' told in rhyme.

line_1: Nor think it vain, tho' told in rhyme.
line_2: But hear this tale of ancient time,

line_1: Elate with wide-extended pow'r,
line_2: Sworn rivals from the natal hour,

line_1: Sworn rivals from the natal hour,
line_2: Elate with wide-extended pow'r,

line_1: AV'RICE and SLOTH, with hostile art
line_2: Contended long for woman's heart;

line_1: Contended long for woman's heart;
line_2: AV'RICE and SLOTH, with hostile art

line_1: She fond of wealth, afraid of toil,
line_2: Still shifted the capricious smile;

line_1: Still shifted the capricious smile;
line_2: She fond of wealth, afraid of toil,

line_1: By turns, to each the heart was sold,
line_2: Now bought with ease, and now with gold;

line_1: Now bought with ease, and now with gold;
line_2: By turns, to each the heart was sold,

line_1: Scarce either grasp the sov'reign sway,
line_2: When chance revers'd the prosp'rous day.

line_1: When chance revers'd the prosp'rous day.
line_2: Scarce either grasp the sov'reign sway,

line_1: The doubtful strife was still renew'd,
line_2: Each baffled oft, but ne'er subdu'd;

line_1: Each baffled oft, but ne'er subdu'd;
line_2: The doubtful strife was still renew'd,

line_1: When AV'RICE shew'd the glitt'ring prize,
line_2: And hopes and fears began to rise,

line_1: And hopes and fears began to rise,
line_2: When AV'RICE shew'd the glitt'ring prize,

line_1: SLOTH shed on ev'ry busy sense
line_2: The gentle balm of indolence.

line_1: The gentle balm of indolence.
line_2: SLOTH shed on ev'ry busy sense

line_1: When SLOTH had screen'd, with artful night,
line_2: The soft pavilion of delight;

line_1: The soft pavilion of delight;
line_2: When SLOTH had screen'd, with artful night,

line_1: Stern AV'RICE, with reproachful frown,
line_2: Would scatter thorns amongst her down.

line_1: Would scatter thorns amongst her down.
line_2: Stern AV'RICE, with reproachful frown,

line_1: Thus each by turns the realm controul'd,
line_2: Which each in turn despair'd to hold;

line_1: Which each in turn despair'd to hold;
line_2: Thus each by turns the realm controul'd,

line_1: At length unable to contend,
line_2: They join to chuse a common friend,

line_1: They join to chuse a common friend,
line_2: At length unable to contend,

line_1: To close in love the long debate,
line_2: Such love, as mutual fears create;

line_1: Such love, as mutual fears create;
line_2: To close in love the long debate,

line_1: A friend they chose, a friend to both,
line_2: Of AV'RICE born, and nurs'd by SLOTH;

line_1: Of AV'RICE born, and nurs'd by SLOTH;
line_2: A friend they chose, a friend to both,

line_1: An artful nymph, whose reign began
line_2: When Wisdom ceas'd to dwell with man;

line_1: When Wisdom ceas'd to dwell with man;
line_2: An artful nymph, whose reign began

line_1: In Wisdom's aweful robes array'd,
line_2: She rules o'er politicks and trade;

line_1: She rules o'er politicks and trade;
line_2: In Wisdom's aweful robes array'd,

line_1: And by the name of CUNNING known,
line_2: Makes wealth, and fame, and pow'r her own.

line_1: Makes wealth, and fame, and pow'r her own.
line_2: And by the name of CUNNING known,

line_1: In quest of CUNNING then they rove
line_2: O'er all the windings of the grove,

line_1: O'er all the windings of the grove,
line_2: In quest of CUNNING then they rove

line_1: Where twining boughs their shade unite,
line_2: For CUNNING ever flies the light;

line_1: For CUNNING ever flies the light;
line_2: Where twining boughs their shade unite,

line_1: At length thro' maze perplex'd with maze,
line_2: Through tracts confus'd, and private ways,

line_1: Through tracts confus'd, and private ways,
line_2: At length thro' maze perplex'd with maze,

line_1: With sinking hearts and weary feet,
line_2: They gain their fav'rite's dark retreat;

line_1: They gain their fav'rite's dark retreat;
line_2: With sinking hearts and weary feet,

line_1: There, watchful at the gate, they find
line_2: SUSPICION, with her eyes behind;

line_2: The trump that shakes the world's repose.

line_1: The guests well known, salute the guard,
line_2: The hundred gates are soon unbarr'd;

line_1: Through half the gloomy cave they press,
line_2: And reach the wily queen's recess;

line_1: And reach the wily queen's recess;

line_1: The wily queen disturb'd, they view,
line_2: With schemes to fly, though none pursue;

line_1: With schemes to fly, though none pursue;

line_1: And, in perpetual care to hide,
line_2: What none will ever seek, employ'd.

line_1: What none will ever seek, employ'd.

line_1: "Great queen (they pray'd) our feuds compose,
line_2: "And let us never more be foes. "

line_1: "And let us never more be foes. "
line_2: "Great queen (they pray'd) our feuds compose,

line_1: "This hour (she cries) your discord ends,
line_2: "Henceforth, be SLOTH and AV'RICE friends;

line_1: "Henceforth, be SLOTH and AV'RICE friends;
line_2: "This hour (she cries) your discord ends,

line_1: "Henceforth, with equal pride, prepare
line_2: "To rule at once the captive fair."

line_1: "To rule at once the captive fair."
line_2: "Henceforth, with equal pride, prepare

line_1: Th' attentive pow'rs in silence heard,
line_2: Nor utter'd what they hop'd or fear'd,

line_1: Nor utter'd what they hop'd or fear'd,

line_1: But search in vain the dark decree,
line_2: For CUNNING loves obscurity;

line_1: For CUNNING loves obscurity;
line_2: But search in vain the dark decree,

line_1: Nor wou'd she soon her laws explain,
line_2: For CUNNING ever joys to pain.

line_1: For CUNNING ever joys to pain.

line_1: She then before their wond'ring eyes,
line_2: Bid piles of painted paper rise;

line_1: Bid piles of painted paper rise;

line_1: "Search now these heaps, (she cries) here find

line_1: "These gifts (said CUNNING) bear away,

line_1: "These charms dispense o'er all the ball,
line_2: "Secure to rule where'er they fall.

line_1: "Secure to rule where'er they fall.

line_2: "The love of money soon ensues;

line_1: "The strong desire shall ne'er decay,

line_1: "Who plays to win, shall win to play;
